titles.title: San Isabel National Forest Land Exchange Act of 2002
To facilitate a land exchange to provide for the acquisition of a private inholding in the San Isabel National Forest in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: 11/13/2002--Introduced. San Isabel National Forest Land Exchange Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to certain land in the San Isabel National Forest, Colorado, to E. Michael Senter of Buena Vista, Colorado, in exchange for certain other land within the boundaries of the San Isabel National Forest. States that the lands exchanged shall be equal. Declares that the Secretary shall pay all direct costs associated with the conveyance. Directs that the land received by the Secretary shall become part of the San Isabel National Forest.
